title: Incubator
description: A sci-fi thriller that reimagines SoC lost 2004 storyline. Overhauled environments, deep plotlines and alternate endings, with a tense, atmospheric journey through a lonelier, more mysterious Zone.

title: GoldSphere
description: A sci-fi thriller that reimagines SoC lost 2004 storyline. Overhauled environments, deep plotlines and alternate endings, with a tense, atmospheric journey through a lonelier, more mysterious Zone.

title: Wind of Time
description: The Zone has began to devour everything, threatening all life on the planet. A time machine is invented to send a military specialist to the past, and prevent humanity's extinction.
